title: Ticket Verification ID Lookup in Seat History Search- UI validations

custom_steps_separated.content: Login to Provenue
custom_steps_separated.expected: Login should be successfull

custom_steps_separated.content: Select the Ticket Services option from the Ticketing menu list at the top left corner in the Home page
custom_steps_separated.expected: The ticket services page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on the Seat History Search tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: The seat history search tab should get displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on 'Search Using' drop- down list
custom_steps_separated.expected: 'Ticket Verification ID' should be available below 'Event' in drop-down list

custom_steps_separated.content: Select 'Ticket Verification ID'
custom_steps_separated.expected: Ticket Verification ID should be selected

custom_steps_separated.content: Verify input field 'Ticket Verification ID'
custom_steps_separated.expected: Input field 'Ticket Verification ID' under Ticet barcode field should be editable and all other fields should be un editable

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on Find button without entering Ticket Verification ID
custom_steps_separated.expected: Error "*Ticket Verification ID is required" should be displayed

title: Verify Transaction Activity of Tickets by looking up Ticket Verification ID

custom_steps_separated.content: Login to Provenue
custom_steps_separated.expected: Login should be successfull

custom_steps_separated.content: Lock and checkout seats by selecting appropriate delivery and Patron
custom_steps_separated.expected: Sale completed successfully

custom_steps_separated.content: Select the Ticket Services option from the Ticketing menu list at the top left corner in the Home page
custom_steps_separated.expected: The ticket services page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on the Seat History Search tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: The seat history search tab should get displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Select 'Ticket Verification ID' in 'Search Using' drop- down list
custom_steps_separated.expected: 'Ticket Verification ID' should be enabled to edit

custom_steps_separated.content: Enter Ticket Verification ID from the Order created above and Click on Find
custom_steps_separated.expected: Seat History Details Page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Select Transaction Activity in 'View Activity' drop-down
custom_steps_separated.expected: Only the Transaction Activity like Sale of the entered Ticket should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Perform Return, Exchange, Reoffer, Upgrade on the above ticket and Refresh the Seat History search page above
custom_steps_separated.expected: All the performed Transaction Activities of the entered Ticket should be displayed correctly

title: Verify Delivery Activity of Tickets by looking up Ticket Verification ID

custom_steps_separated.content: Login to Provenue
custom_steps_separated.expected: Login should be successfull

custom_steps_separated.content: Lock and checkout seats by selecting appropriate delivery and Patron
custom_steps_separated.expected: Sale completed successfully

custom_steps_separated.content: Select the Ticket Services option from the Ticketing menu list at the top left corner in the Home page
custom_steps_separated.expected: The ticket services page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on the Seat History Search tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: The seat history search tab should get displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Select 'Ticket Verification ID' in 'Search Using' drop- down list
custom_steps_separated.expected: 'Ticket Verification ID' should be enabled to edit

custom_steps_separated.content: Enter Ticket Verification ID from the Order created above and Click on Find
custom_steps_separated.expected: Seat History Details Page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Select Delivery Activity in 'View Activity' drop-down
custom_steps_separated.expected: Only the Delivery Activity with clickable Delivery ID, Transaction ID and Order ID of the entered Ticket should be displayed which directs the user to the appropriate delivery details page

custom_steps_separated.content: Perform Change Delivery on the above ticket and Refresh the Seat History search page above
custom_steps_separated.expected: All the performed Delivery Activities of the entered Ticket should be displayed correctly

title: Verify Ticket Printing Activity of Tickets by looking up Ticket Verification ID

custom_steps_separated.content: Login to Provenue
custom_steps_separated.expected: Login should be successfull

custom_steps_separated.content: Lock and checkout seats by selecting appropriate delivery and Patron
custom_steps_separated.expected: Sale completed successfully

custom_steps_separated.content: Print the above tickets
custom_steps_separated.expected: Tickets Printed successfully

custom_steps_separated.content: Select the Ticket Services option from the Ticketing menu list at the top left corner in the Home page
custom_steps_separated.expected: The ticket services page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on the Seat History Search tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: The seat history search tab should get displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Select 'Ticket Verification ID' in 'Search Using' drop- down list
custom_steps_separated.expected: 'Ticket Verification ID' should be enabled to edit

custom_steps_separated.content: Enter Ticket Verification ID from the Order created above and Click on Find
custom_steps_separated.expected: Seat History Details Page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Select Ticket Printing Activity in 'View Activity' drop-down
custom_steps_separated.expected: Only the Ticket Printing Activity with all the print details like Job type, barcode of the entered Ticket should be displayed correctly

custom_steps_separated.content: Perform Reissue, Reprint, Reset operations on the above ticket (via Paper Ticket Print and Message a Ticket both) and Refresh the Seat History search page above
custom_steps_separated.expected: All the performed Ticket Printing Activities of the entered Ticket should be displayed correctly

title: Verify Hold Code Activity of Tickets by looking up Ticket Verification ID

custom_steps_separated.content: Login to Provenue
custom_steps_separated.expected: Login should be successfull

custom_steps_separated.content: Lock and checkout seats by selecting appropriate delivery and Patron
custom_steps_separated.expected: Sale completed successfully

custom_steps_separated.content: Select the Ticket Services option from the Ticketing menu list at the top left corner in the Home page

title: Verify Market Offer Activity of Tickets by looking up Ticket Verification ID

custom_steps_separated.content: Login to Provenue
custom_steps_separated.expected: Login should be successfull

custom_steps_separated.content: Lock and checkout seats by selecting appropriate delivery and Patron
custom_steps_separated.expected: Sale completed successfully

custom_steps_separated.content: Perform a Legacy Market Offer Reale, Donation or Consign back on the above tickets
custom_steps_separated.expected: Legacy Market Offer created for the tickets

custom_steps_separated.content: Select the Ticket Services option from the Ticketing menu list at the top left corner in the Home page
custom_steps_separated.expected: The ticket services page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on the Seat History Search tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: The seat history search tab should get displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Select 'Ticket Verification ID' in 'Search Using' drop- down list
custom_steps_separated.expected: 'Ticket Verification ID' should be enabled to edit

custom_steps_separated.content: Enter Ticket Verification ID from the Order created above and Click on Find
custom_steps_separated.expected: Seat History Details Page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Select Market Offer Activity in 'View Activity' drop-down
custom_steps_separated.expected: Only the Market Activity with clickable SaleType and other Agency/User details of the entered Ticket should be displayed which directs the user to the appropriate Market Offer History details page

custom_steps_separated.content: Perform MMS Resale offer on the above ticket and Refresh the Seat History search page above
custom_steps_separated.expected: All the performed Market Offer Activities of the entered Ticket should be displayed correctly

title: Verify All Activity of Tickets by looking up Ticket Verification ID

custom_steps_separated.expected: Sale completed successfully

custom_steps_separated.content: Select the Ticket Services option from the Ticketing menu list at the top left corner in the Home page
